image-ocean.name: Image Ocean
image-ocean.description: An online image repository allowing users to upload public images into a centralized gallery or private images that only they can see.

covidnn.name: CovidNN
covidnn.description: An Application of Convolutional Neural Networks for COVID-19 CT Scan Classification. Pu, C., Shih, A., & Cai, S. (2020).

jinx.name: Jinx
jinx.description: An all in one social platform created to help students and young adults streamline their job search by tracking their applications, postings, companies, and connections.

drift.name: Drift
drift.description: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript carousel which can be used standalone or as a background.

simplemlp.name: simpleMLP
simplemlp.description: An R package consisting of a multilayer perceptron neural network implementation, featuring 2 ReLU hidden layers, and achieving 96% test accuracy on MNIST.

arctic-miner.name: Arctic Miner
arctic-miner.subtitle:
Made for UofTHacks VII
Winner: ChainSafeâ€™s Build With Blockchain Award
arctic-miner.description: A web application allowing users to visualize the concept of blockchain by collecting penguins on an ethereum blockchain.

politician-game.name: Politician Game
politician-game.description: A satirical android game which uses three minigames to simulate a political campaign with support for user login, leaderboards, and unlockable sprites.

meal-prep-4-u.name: Meal Prep 4 U
meal-prep-4-u.subtitle: Made for BostonHacks 2019
meal-prep-4-u.description: A web application promoting healthy eating habits through meal preparation by generating recipes based on user's ingredients and preferences.
